assessment_metadata.assessed_by: Western Europe Airport Data Collection Subagent
assessment_metadata.assessment_scope: Comprehensive risk factor analysis for three Western European business aviation airports

general: ICAO regulations and Air Navigation Plans
Airport official websites and FBO resources
france_lfpb: French DGAC (Direction Générale de l'Aviation Civile)
switzerland_lsgg: Swiss FOCA (Federal Office of Civil Aviation)

LFPB.location: Northeast of Paris, approximately 11 km from city center

data.curfew_details: Jet engine departures prohibited 22:15-06:00 local time, except medical evacuations. Arrivals available 24/7.

operational_hours.impact_notes: Night curfew restricts flexibility for last-minute departures; arrivals unaffected

data.slot_availability_typical: Generally available; high demand during events (Paris Air Show, French Open)
data.peak_congestion_times: May-June (French Open), July-September (summer travel), Air Show biennially
data.coordination_note: Temporary slot coordination November 5-December 10, 2024, and January 7-February 11, 2025

slot_requirements.impact_notes: Slots managed via E-Airportslots; major events create substantial congestion

data.wind_limitations: Moderate; three runways (07/25, 03/21, 09/27) provide directional flexibility
data.climate: Temperate marine; fog common in Île-de-France region

weather_vulnerability.impact_notes: Fog notably impacts visibility; CAT II operations available for runway 27

runways.note: Limited to aircraft weighing maximum 5.7 tons from 21:15 to 05:00 local time

data.crosswind_limitations: Moderate; triple simultaneous parallel approaches possible
data.weight_restrictions: Large aircraft (codes E and F) require prior coordination with aerodrome operator

runway_specifications.impact_notes: Three runways reduce weather impacts; night restrictions on smallest runway

data.crew_visa_requirements: EU/Schengen crews: passport required. Non-Schengen: Schengen visa required; crew visas issued upon arrival valid 72 hours
data.documentation_required: Crew licenses (EASA/ICAO certified), certificates of airworthiness, registration, insurance, noise certificates

crew_requirements.impact_notes: Non-EU crew require Schengen visa coordination; ramp checks frequent for international flights

data.customs_hours: 24/7 for CIQ clearance at FBO (approximately 5-10 minutes processing)
data.immigration_processing_time_avg: 10-15 minutes for passengers; crew can bypass immigration
data.weekend_surcharges: Available at all times without surcharges
data.fbo_options: Multiple FBOs including Universal Aviation, Samsic Aero, Sky Echlipse
data.parking_availability: Limited during peak times; advance booking essential

handling_complexity.impact_notes: Efficient CIQ processing; hangar/parking space limited during events; advance coordination essential

data.airspace_complexity: Moderate; proximity to Paris CDG/Orly airspace requires ATC coordination

congestion_metrics.impact_notes: Predictable delay patterns; high movement volume does not typically cause major congestion

data.landing_permit_processing_time: Typically same-day if requested in advance
data.documentation_required: Flight schedule, crew passport copies, receiving party details

permits_and_clearances.impact_notes: PPR mandatory; advance booking essential to avoid last-minute rejections

data.chapter_requirements: ICAO Chapter 4 (Stage 4) compliance required for new aircraft. Chapter 3 (Stage 2/3) aircraft subject to arrival time restrictions after 23:30 and before 06:15
data.noise_surcharges: Landing fees modulated based on aircraft noise classification (highest for loudest aircraft)
data.preferred_departure_routes: Specific SIDs (Standard Instrument Departures) designated for noise abatement

noise_restrictions.impact_notes: Stage 2 aircraft heavily penalized; newer aircraft preferred. Advance payment of noise-modulated landing fees required

data.historical_closure_incidents: No major extended closures in recent history

data.enhanced_security_periods: Elevated during major events and peak travel
data.vip_security_delays: Managed through FBO VIP channels; minimal delays

data.ski_season_congestion: Not applicable (Alpine resort not proximity factor)
data.winter_deicing_delays_avg: Not typical; deicing available when needed
data.holiday_peak_dates: French Open (May-June), Summer holidays (July-August), Air Show (odd years, June)

seasonal_factors.impact_notes: Predictable seasonal patterns; major events create temporary congestion

data.note: CDG primarily commercial; not ideal for business aviation. Next alternate: Le Touquet (LFAT) at 75 km

alternate_airport_proximity.impact_notes: Limited suitable alternates; CDG congested with commercial traffic; Le Touquet distant but feasible

payment_and_fees.description: Financial arrangements that may cause delays

data.fuel_payment_terms: Varies by provider; typically prepayment or credit card at time of uplift
data.landing_fees: Noise-modulated; invoiced directly by Aéroports de Paris (ADP) from April 1, 2022 onwards
data.fee_payment_note: Universal Aviation no longer pays landing fees on behalf of operators as of April 2022

payment_and_fees.impact_notes: Payment systems reliable; advance coordination prevents delays

EGGX.location: 32 miles north of central London, Bedfordshire

data.curfew_details: Summer 2025: Ad-hoc night slots restricted (23:00-06:59); pool of 100 slots available first-come-first-served. Only aircraft with QC rating ≤0.5 permitted at night.
data.summer_2025_note: Runway closures for maintenance: Sundays May 25-June 29, 03:00-05:20 local time

operational_hours.impact_notes: Strict night restrictions particularly from June-September 2025; daytime operations unrestricted

data.slot_availability_typical: Constrained during peak hours; slots must be confirmed
data.night_slots_summer: Maximum 100 ad-hoc movements pool (June 14-September 17, 2025); very limited

slot_requirements.impact_notes: Slot-controlled airport; business aviation requires advance planning; night slots extremely limited

data.snow_closure_frequency: Rare; UK South East climate mild
data.wind_limitations: Moderate; single runway (08/26) can limit operations in crosswind conditions

weather_vulnerability.impact_notes: Single runway vulnerability in certain wind conditions; generally stable UK weather

data.crosswind_limitations: Significant constraint; single runway limits flexibility in crosswind conditions
data.weight_restrictions: Accommodates wide range of aircraft; no specific restrictions noted

runway_specifications.impact_notes: Single runway is major operational constraint; no crosswind alternatives

data.crew_visa_requirements: Post-BREXIT: Non-UK/EU crew may require visa; EU crew passports sufficient for Schengen waiver countries
data.documentation_required: Standard UK entry requirements; crew passports mandatory

crew_requirements.impact_notes: Post-BREXIT crew coordination required; EU crew generally hassle-free with passports

data.weekend_surcharges: Yes; surcharges for out-of-hours operations (25-50% depending on shift)
data.handler_providers: Signature Flight Support (Terminal 1: 24hrs, Terminal 2: dawn-dusk), EVO Jet, Harrods Aviation

handling_complexity.impact_notes: Mandatory handling increases costs; multiple FBOs available; out-of-hours surcharges significant

data.airspace_complexity: Moderate; proximity to London airspace (Luton Radar sector)
data.annual_passengers: 18 million current; expanding to 32 million post-expansion

congestion_metrics.impact_notes: Growing congestion due to airport expansion; daytime delays predictable

data.foreign_carrier_permit: £107 per application if applicable (commercial operations only)
data.note: Non-EU registered charter flights require UK CAA landing permits (standard lead time 3 business days)

permits_and_clearances.impact_notes: No PPR required for GA; commercial operations require permits

data.chapter_requirements: Aircraft with QC (Quota Count) > 0.5 prohibited at night (22:00-05:59). Summer 2025: Only QC ≤ 0.5 permitted during night ad-hoc operations
data.noise_surcharges: Day operations (06:00-22:59): Up to 400% surcharge for noise violations. Night operations (23:00-05:59): 300-600% surcharge
data.preferred_departure_routes: Noise Preferential Routes (NPRs) enforced up to 3,000 ft day / 4,000 ft night; specific routes require higher altitudes

noise_restrictions.impact_notes: Strict noise controls; QC rating critical for night operations. Significant surcharges for violations.

data.maintenance_note: Night closures Monday-Friday 00:01-05:45 local time; break December 19, 2025-January 4, 2026

data.enhanced_security_periods: Standard UK security; elevated during security alerts

seasonal_factors.impact_notes: Predictable summer peaks; winter generally stable

alternate_airport_proximity.impact_notes: Multiple suitable alternates within reasonable distance; Stansted preferred for GA

payment_and_fees.description: Financial arrangements that may cause delays

data.fuel_payment_terms: Typically credit card or prepayment at uplift
data.handling_charges: Band G aircraft (25-35,999 kg MTOW): £725/hour off-peak, £1,087/hour peak; 6% airport levy applied
data.surcharges: 25% surcharge for one sector out-of-hours, 50% for two sectors

payment_and_fees.impact_notes: Payment systems reliable; out-of-hours surcharges substantial

LSGG.location: 4 km northwest of Geneva city center, near Switzerland-France border

data.night_operations: Limited; non-commercial flights allowed 06:00-22:00 only. Commercial flights 06:00-00:30.

operational_hours.impact_notes: Effective night ban for non-commercial flights; limited evening operations

data.slot_availability_typical: Requires advance coordination; slots allocated in 19-minute blocks
data.peak_congestion_times: 08:00-18:00 weekdays; Geneva Motor Show (March) and EBACE (May)
data.ga_ba_note: No slots available through commercial slot coordination; PPR required instead

slot_requirements.impact_notes: Strict slot coordination; 5-day advance booking for IFR flights mandatory

data.snow_closure_frequency: Occasional in winter; nearby Alps influence weather patterns
data.wind_limitations: Moderate; Alpine wind patterns can affect operations
data.seasonal_risk_periods: November-February (winter Alpine conditions); occasional summer thunderstorms
data.alpine_considerations: Proximity to Alps creates variable weather; rapid weather changes possible
data.winter_impact: Snow and ice possible; de-icing services available

weather_vulnerability.impact_notes: Alpine weather patterns create seasonal vulnerability; winter operations challenging

runways.ils_capability: CAT I for runway 04, CAT IIIb for runway 22

data.crosswind_limitations: Primary runway accommodates all aircraft; good all-weather capability
data.weight_restrictions: Accommodates wide range including heavy jets

runway_specifications.impact_notes: Single primary runway with excellent ILS; capable of handling significant weather

data.crew_visa_requirements: EU/Schengen crews: passport sufficient. Non-Schengen: Visa required; crew visas issued upon arrival, typically valid 72 hours
data.documentation_required: Flight crew licenses (EASA/ICAO certified), certificates of airworthiness, registration, insurance

crew_requirements.impact_notes: Standard requirements; non-Schengen crew visa coordination necessary

data.fuel_availability: JET A-1 available on-site; quick turnaround support
data.weekend_surcharges: No specific surcharges; services available all week
data.self_handling_note: Not permitted; mandatory handling agent required for all operations

handling_complexity.impact_notes: Mandatory handling increases costs; professional service providers available

data.airspace_complexity: Low-Moderate; Switzerland SES (Single European Sky) participant
data.event_impact: Geneva Motor Show and EBACE create temporary congestion

congestion_metrics.impact_notes: Efficient operations; growth expected but currently stable

data.ppr_booking_timeline_irr_vfr: 5 days advance for IFR; 1 day for VFR commercial
data.ppr_booking_timeline_ga: 5 days for IFR non-commercial; day-of for VFR non-commercial
data.epermi_system: FOCA (Federal Office of Civil Aviation) ePermit system for non-repetitive flights (24-72 hours before departure)
data.documentation_required: Flight plan, crew licenses (EASA/ICAO), proof of insurance

permits_and_clearances.impact_notes: Mandatory PPR with strict advance notice requirements; FOCA ePermit system for non-regular flights

data.chapter_requirements: EASA Chapter 4 (Stage 4) compliance strongly encouraged. Aircraft with noise certification margin ≤ 5 dBA prohibited from night operations.
data.noise_surcharges: Applied based on aircraft noise classification; modulated charges encourage quieter aircraft
data.preferred_departure_routes: Standard Instrument Departures (SIDs) mandatory; continuous descent arrival (CDA) procedures preferred
data.noise_complaints_risk: Moderate; active monitoring program; 24,000 affected during day, 75,000 at night

noise_restrictions.impact_notes: Noise restrictions limiting noisier aircraft; expansion requires meeting noise reduction targets

data.maintenance_closure_days_annual: Minimal; scheduled maintenance during low-traffic periods
data.historical_closure_incidents: June 2024: Brief closure due to control tower flooding (weather-related); resolved quickly

infrastructure_reliability.impact_notes: Generally reliable; weather events rare but possible

data.enhanced_security_periods: Standard Swiss security; no elevated requirements

data.ski_season_congestion: Not at airport; nearby Alps create winter weather challenges
data.winter_deicing_delays_avg: Available on demand; typically not significant

seasonal_factors.impact_notes: Events create predictable congestion; winter weather variability important

data.annemasse_note: Smaller airport; customs/immigration support; 30-minute drive to Geneva

alternate_airport_proximity.impact_notes: Annemasse very close and accessible; good backup option for diversions

payment_and_fees.description: Financial arrangements that may cause delays

data.handling_charges: Approximately CHF 300-500 depending on aircraft type
data.ground_handler_mandatory: All operators must use authorized handling agents

payment_and_fees.impact_notes: Swiss pricing higher than neighboring countries; payment systems reliable

primary_risk_factors: Alpine weather vulnerability and winter closures
Mandatory 5-day advance PPR booking for IFR flights
Night ban for non-commercial flights (06:00-22:00 effective hours)
Strict noise restrictions for noisier aircraft
rank.operational_complexity: High - Alpine location creates weather challenges; Swiss regulatory framework strict

primary_risk_factors: Night curfew 22:15-06:00 local time restricts flexibility
High congestion during peak season events
rank.operational_complexity: High - Major hub with event-driven congestion; night restrictions significant

primary_risk_factors: Single runway limits flexibility in crosswind conditions
Strict night slot restrictions (Summer 2025: only 100 slots for ad-hoc, QC ≤ 0.5 only)
rank.operational_complexity: Medium-High - Single runway constraint; night restrictions growing

comparative_advantages.LFPB: 24/7 arrivals without slots; multiple runways for weather flexibility; no diplomatic clearance required; efficient CIQ processing
comparative_advantages.EGGX: No PPR required; multiple alternate airports within short distance; daytime operations unrestricted; straightforward regulatory environment
comparative_advantages.LSGG: Reliable weather handling (CAT IIIb capability); efficient operations; excellent backup (Annemasse 13 km); professional infrastructure; good alternate airports

critical_success_factors.advance_planning: All three airports require 24+ hour advance coordination; LSGG requires 5 days for IFR
critical_success_factors.cost_considerations: LSGG mandatory handling (most expensive); EGGX out-of-hours surcharges; LFPB noise-modulated fees
critical_success_factors.seasonal_planning: LFPB: May-June events create congestion. EGGX: June-September night restrictions. LSGG: Alpine weather November-February.
critical_success_factors.crew_documentation: EU crews generally straightforward; non-Schengen crews require advance visa coordination for LFPB/LSGG
